name: ListSlackIntegrationMappings
description:
Retrieve Slack integration mappings for a Box enterprise.

This tool is used to list Slack integration mappings within a user's enterprise on Box. It requires Admin or Co-Admin privileges.

parameters.name: pagination_start_marker
parameters.description: Defines the starting position for pagination results. Requires 'usemarker' to be true.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: max_items_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of Slack integration mappings to return per page from the user's enterprise.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: mapped_item_type
parameters.description: The type of mapped item for which the Slack integration mapping should be returned. Only 'channel' is supported.

value_schema.description: Mapped item type, for which the mapping should be returned.

parameters.name: mapped_item_id
parameters.description: ID of the mapped item for which the Slack integration mapping should be retrieved.

value_schema.description:
ID of the mapped item,
for which the mapping should be returned.

parameters.name: box_item_id
parameters.description: Box item ID for which to retrieve Slack integration mappings. Must be a valid ID within the user's enterprise.

value_schema.description: Box item ID, for which the mappings should be returned.

parameters.name: box_item_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of Box item for which the mappings should be returned. Currently, only 'folder' is supported.

value_schema.description:
Box item type, for
which the mappings should be returned.

parameters.name: include_manually_created_mappings
parameters.description: Set to true to include mappings that have been manually created.

value_schema.description: Whether the mapping has been manually created.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: partner_item_type
parameters.description: Mapped item type, for which the mapping should be returned.

value_schema.description: Mapped item type, for which the mapping should be returned.

parameters.name: partner_item_id
parameters.description:
ID of the mapped item,
for which the mapping should be returned.

value_schema.description:
ID of the mapped item,
for which the mapping should be returned.

parameters.name: box_item_id
parameters.description: Box item ID, for which the mappings should be returned.

value_schema.description: Box item ID, for which the mappings should be returned.

parameters.name: box_item_type
parameters.description:
Box item type, for
which the mappings should be returned.

value_schema.description:
Box item type, for
which the mappings should be returned.

parameters.name: is_manually_created
parameters.description: Whether the mapping has been manually created.

value_schema.description: Whether the mapping has been manually created.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
